title: My Favorite City
moreText: Our poetic impulse to make a good story better, has always led to exaggerated tales of beauty and wonder and the truth is, that history is but a blend of facts and fiction and I know nothing.

title: Topsy Turvy
moreText: I used to like rhyming. But not anymore. Expect drastic changes in writing style...

title: A Generation Gap
moreText: Thinking out loud is just a fancy phrase for my endless pointless ranting. So if you have nothing better to do...
